text: An object is charged when it has a charge imbalance, which means the

options.c: Object contains equal number of electrons and protons
options.d: Object contains unequal number of electrons and protons

hint: An object is said to be charged, if it has a deficiency of electron or excess of electrons. That means it contains and unequal number of protons and electrons. 33. Which of the following materials is the best conductor of electricity? a) Platinum b) Gold c) Silicond) Copper  Key: d
